content: P 8000 D Pneumatic adhesive dispenser Pneumatic powered hybrid/epoxy adhesive anchor dispenser ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Tools for fasteners- ### FEATURES:Features Dosing system for precise hole filling Robust dispenser for tough jobsite conditions High-speed injection Applications Injecting Hilti HIT adhesive mortar for fastening anchor rods and rebar in concrete and masonry Injecting Hilti HIT adhesive anchor mortar for fastening threaded rod, rebar and inserts in concrete and masonry For use with 1400 ml HIT foil packs For use with 47.3 oz (1400 ml) HIT jumbo foil packs ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dispenser type: Pneumatic Technical Data | Dispenser type | Pneumatic ### ITEMS- 373959 - Pneumatic dispenser P 8000 D - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x P 8000 D Dispenser assy - 1x VIC Cassette printed - 1x P 8000 D Carrying device
